<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Ask a Question">bb4641aedb8e6010e420b08039961931</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Default Value Requested For Field</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var crrValue = g_form.getValue('requested_for');
	var userName = g_user.userID;
	g_form.clearOptions('requested_for');
	if (crrValue == "") {
		g_form.setValue('requested_for',userName);
	}
	else{
		g_form.setValue('requested_for',crrValue);
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-04 15:49:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>20f5327edb022010e420b08039961995</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Value Requested For Field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Serivce Management" source="x_568222_fsm">5c67a5f1db422010e420b080399619ce</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Serivce Management">5c67a5f1db422010e420b080399619ce</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_20f5327edb022010e420b08039961995</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-09 08:43:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
